members.member: * Object that represents an encoded packet. * @author Jos≈Ω Lopes *
* The encoded content of this packet.

* Returns (a copy of) the list of connections this packet has with the source packets. * @return A copy of the list of connections this packet has with the source packets.
* Returns the encoded content of this packet. * @return The encoded content of this packet.
* Adds a new element to the list of connections this packet has with the source packets. * @param i New element for the list of connections this packet has with the source packets.

* Removes a connection from the list of connections this packet has with the source packets. * @param i Element (Object, not index) to be removed from the list of connections this packet has with the source packets.
